Class PPBooleanVar

  • Object
    • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.PPShape

  • public class PPBooleanVar
extends PPVariable
    This class represents a local variable of type boolean.

      • PPBooleanVar

        public PPBooleanVar(String name,
                    double width)
        Returns a new PPBooleanVar object with the specified name. This version of the constructor allows the client to set the width.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the variable
        width - The width of the variable in pixels

      • set

        public void set(boolean value,
                String options)
        Sets the value of the variable. This version of the method allows the client to modify the animation options.
        Parameters:
        value - The new value of the variable
        options - The animation options
